General.Name: Intelicanna Ltd
General.Description: Intelicanna Ltd operates as pharmaceutical company in Israel. It grows, cultivates, produces, research, markets, and sells medical cannabis. The company was formerly known as Tefen Industrial Engineering & Management & Systems Analysis and changed its name to Intelicanna Ltd in March 2019. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Hod Hasharon, Israel.
General.Address: 5 Menachem Begin Aveune, Beit Dagan, Israel, 50200
